message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, $950,000 is still a bit below what I'm looking for. I'm willing to come down to $980,000.  This reflects the value of the product and allows for a mutually beneficial transaction. Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $960,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
